The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

C:\\Users\\uday_\\trainingWorkSpace\\Tas.serviceRawFile:
service: task-manager-app

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-2
  environment:
    TABLE_NAME: Tasks   # DynamoDB table name
    BEDROCK_REGION: us-east-2
  deploymentBucket:
    name: my-sls-task-bucket
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - dynamodb:*
      Resource: "*"
    - Effect: "Allow"
      Action:
        - bedrock:InvokeModel
      Resource: "*"

functions:
  app:
    handler: server.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: api/tasks
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/tasks/{proxy+}
          method: ANY
          cors: true
      - http:
          path: api/chat
          method: post
          cors: true
